title: Bella Vita Clone
description: Using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and localStorage, replicating the main features of the original website with a home page and key navigation elements.

title: Sugar-cosmetics
description: A e-commercial site built with React, featuring a responsive design, interactive product catalog, shopping cart, and user authentication for Sugar Cosmetics.

title: Superhero Project
description: A responsive HTML and CSS superhero project reimagining Mahadev as a modern-day hero, blending ancient mythology with contemporary and responsive design.
